mapper.select: select sum(cost) cost, to_char(costdate, 'mm') month from storehistory where storeid= #{storeid} and to_char(costdate, 'rrrr') = to_char(sysdate, 'rrrr') group by to_char(costdate, 'mm') order by month
select * from storehistory, userinfo where storeid=#{storeid} and storehistory.userid = userinfo.userid order by costdate desc
select userinfo.* from userinfo, storehistory where userinfo.userid = storehistory.userid
